description: Quality Classics  We specialize in creating hard to find, high quality, classic books optimized for the Kindle.  Sick of spelling errors, weird characters, or a lack of pictures in illustrated books? Well we know how you feel. We always have the highest quality books. All of our books are formatted and reviewed by an actual human for the Kindle, and always 99 cents.  To find more of our books search "quality classics" in Amazon.
author: Arthur Tappan Pierson
